page.title: 11PLAYGROUND GAMES.
page.content:
Squash ________ You play by giving everybody a number and taking it in turns to kick a ball against a wall. If somebody kicks the ball and it doesn't hit the wall,that person is out.It carries on until only one person is left in the game.That person is the winner.
Dobby Metal _____________ This is similar to normal dobby except that you have a base on metal. You choose someone to be on,then that person chases everybody except the people who are touching metal eg.screws,nails,wire,bars,pipes, bikes and dustbins.When someone is 'dobbed' they are on and so on.
